## directory.remove() function

ensures that a directory only filled with files and directories is removed recursively removes all files and subdirectories as well as the root directory

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function remove(path: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path to remove |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
